```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(gtsummary)

load(here::here("datasets.rdata"))

theme_set(theme_bw() + theme(legend.position = "bottom"))
```

# Table 1

```{r}
data_expanded %>% 
  distinct(subject_id, treatment_group, age, gender) %>% 
  select(-subject_id) %>% 
  tbl_summary(by = treatment_group) %>% 
  add_overall()
```

# Spaghetti plot for patient trajectories over time

```{r}
data_expanded_tidy %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = day_factor, y = mem_comp, color = treatment_group, group = subject_id)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  labs(x = "Day",
       color = "Treatment",
       y = "Cognitive Rating",
       caption = "Higher cognitive rating indicates better memory.") +
  facet_grid(.~treatment_group)
```
